{"id":445138486,"lang":"cpp","time":"8Â months","timestamp":1611083035,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/445138486/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Encode and Decode TinyURL","memory":"7 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    unordered_map<size_t, string> urls;\n    \npublic:\n\n    // Encodes a URL to a shortened URL.\n    string encode(string longUrl) {\n        size_t result = hash<string>()(longUrl);\n        urls[result] = longUrl;\n        return to_string(result);\n    }\n\n    // Decodes a shortened URL to its original URL.\n    string decode(string shortUrl) {\n        return urls[stoul(shortUrl)];\n    }\n};\n\n// Your Solution object will be instantiated and called as such:\n// Solution solution;\n// solution.decode(solution.encode(url));","compare_result":"","title_slug":"encode-and-decode-tinyurl"}
